website_summaries.verdict: Extra touches – such as no-rust casters and U-shaped opening in front – are in the design to streamline the showering process.
pros: Seat and back are fashioned from blow molded plastic and built to last
Wheels lock in place when needed
Seat snaps off for ease of cleaning when not in use
cons: Unlike similar chairs, the seat is made from molded plastic instead of vinyl covered foam, resulting in comfort swapped out for durability

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Shower Chair
customer_reviews.text: This is shower chair perfection. It's comfortable, has maximum stability & with the locking wheels provides flexibility. My husband has been disabled for almost four years, this is the chair I wish we had all along. Well worth the money. It came mostly assembled, all I had to do was snap the back and secure the seat into place and we were ready to roll. I can't say enough about this shower chair. Don't hesitate just get it.
customer_reviews.author: Jill T.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for showers
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for showers. Does not roll over chair height toilet unless seat removed and is also a little too deep to work well. Might work better over a different toilet. Easy to clean and rolls very well.
customer_reviews.author: CaryGrayHair

customer_reviews.title: don't like this chair
customer_reviews.text: The surface is very hard, my mom can almost go through the hole. Wished the seat was cushioned and hole wasn't so wide.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy Geraldine Akin-Hogman

customer_reviews.title: Made showering my disabled wife much easier.
customer_reviews.text: This shower chair has changed my life! I’m now able to bathe my wife (who is a stroke victim) easier, with less strain on my back, and minimal transferring (bed to shower chair), and vice versa. I would give it 10 stars if that was an option.
customer_reviews.author: bobstidham

customer_reviews.title: Works great now we can give our handicap friend a bath
customer_reviews.text: Works great now we can give our handicap friend a bath, rolls right in the shower, and work amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy but light weight. Easy to manipulate. Hole is a bit too big.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Makes bathtime easy
customer_reviews.text: Love this chair. So easy to maneuver. Locks work very securely. Wish there was a smaller size for petite adults.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Brosche

customer_reviews.title: It was perfect for our needs and price was great too
customer_reviews.text: It was perfect for our needs and price was great too. Easy to clean and all four wheels lock. Very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like everything about it
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about it! It has given my son the freedom to shower himself. The brakes are great, don’t have to worry, but moves easily when needed. The seat is accessible and the arms give him great support.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine LeMay

customer_reviews.title: Nicely constructed and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Nicely constructed and sturdy. We had to return it as our newly installed shower was smaller than we expected, but wouldn't have hesitated to keep and use it if it fit in the space we have available.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I got this for my special needs son and I'm ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my special needs son and I'm loving that I can roll him from the changing table into the shower with ease. Casters lock quickly with slight tap and I don't need to lock all four to keep the chair from moving.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke C.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my dad works perfect for him! And fast shipping!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Innovative Products Unlimited ELT817 B Elite Shower Chair, 21 lb
product_meta.description: Virtually indestructible blow molded seat and backrest available in Blue, Gray and Red. Open-front seat and U-shaped opening in frame allow easy access for bathing care. Special seat design offers unmatched comfort. Snap-on seat lifts off frame for easy cleaning. Never rust, all locking, twin-wheel casters. Backrest push handles for easy mobility.
feature_bullets: Deluxe, No-Rust, twin-wheel casters (All locking). The clearance is 17 inches and the weight capacity is 325 pounds
Use as a shower chair and over an existing toilet bowl measuring less than 17" from the floor to the top of the ceramic bowl
Snap-on seat lifts off frame for easy cleaning
The seating area measures 20" from the floor
